name: The Lost Picture
description:
You have been cursed by a witch! Now you're forced to lose something different every day. What will you lose? No one knows! It could be your legs, your money or even your patience. Collect the picture fragments to break the spell!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Z: next / jump

Credits:

  • Anter: Lead director, programmer and level design.
  • nzima: Art and sprite work.
  • Bubbax: Art and sprite work.
  • Thundrabolt: Music and ideas.

This game was made in 2 days for the 2021 Global Game Jam.
